mapper.select: SELECT TI.id AS trade_item_id , TI.trade_id , TI.gacha_id , TI.type , TI.status , TI.created_at , TI.updated_at , TI.sales_item_id , GI_S.name AS sales_item_name , TI.sales_price , TI.exchange_give_item_id , GI_E1.name AS exchange_give_item_name , TI.exchange_want_item_id , GI_E2.name AS exchange_want_item_name FROM TRADE_ITEM TI LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_S ON GI_S.id = TI.sales_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E1 ON GI_E1.id = TI.exchange_give_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E2 ON GI_E2.id = TI.exchange_want_item_id WHERE TI.trade_id = #{tradeId} AND TI.status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY TI.created_at DESC
SELECT status FROM TRADE_ITEM where id = #{tradeItemId}
